name: Operation Desert Road
description: Operation Desert Road is a retro style arcade action game. Climb aboard your vehicle and destroy everything on your way!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 - 64bits Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphique Storage: 180 MB available space Sound Card: All
